description.en:
BitBall (BTB) - BitBall (BTB) - All in One Decentralized Cryptocurrency.#NoFakePromises

A unique Multipurpose Digital currency with Endless Possibilities and Rewards - Building Bridge between Digital currencies, Exchanges & Clients all over the world. Our main goals are related to transactions across the globe with a user friendly interface, making it accessible to everyone at every level.. #NoFakePromises.

It will have 2 parts,
1. Exchange of #Cryptocurrency between people with social media profiles.
2. #Ebarter system (historical barter trade between people based on Cryptocurrency). #NoFakePromises.

status_updates.description:
Healm #Metaverse x Bitball Ecosysten (#BTB, #BTRS, #BSP, #BART, #MEMELON).

Find your Gem with our Metaverse partner @HealmXR .
A world class VR platform with NFTs, lot of backers & well known partners.

Info: https://www.healm.com/partners

Due to Binance chain (#BSC) Exploit/Hack, 
BSC Devs/Cz/Validators decided to halt transactions on #BSC.
Due to which, we have decided to relaunch #MEMELON on more #decentralized Ethereum chain.

People holding MEMELON on exchanges won’t need to do anything, MEMELON on #BSC will automatically convert into the #Ethereum chain one.

People holding the tokens in their wallets will be prompt to transfer their #BSC Tokens to exchanges or they can fill up a form to convert to the new one

We always like to update things on our Ecosystem!

Cryptocurrencies page on our website is now called Crypto_Map + Homepage layout updated.

https://www.bitball-btb.com

Make sure to subscribe to our Newsletter👨‍💻

We only deliver important news like trading competition or Airdrops.

Tweet: https://twitter.com/bitball_erc20/status/1562421729611612164?s=21&t=zmyTQfi-LwHz1XN9ea9fmA

⚠️ Attention ⚠️

We are not running any airdrops of any sorts. 

If you have received this message on telegram or any other social media channel, please block & report.

Remember, Admins will never DM you first.

Thank you for your support.

Tweet: https://twitter.com/bitballtreasure/status/1561217869131939841

For #Bitball Ecosystem's next big partnership/collaboration, we are in talks with #Okx regarding integration of our Tokens on #OKXChain.

This will include,
-Exposure to the OKC ecosystem (260+ projects).
-Marketing & much more.

https://www.okx.com/okc
https://okc-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest

Tweet: https://twitter.com/BitBall_Erc20/status/1559175055493324800

Next Joint Collaboration with @HealmXR Metaverse - 300 ACRE LAND #GIVEAWAY. 

Win in-game Land Blocks 🎉.

Maximize income potential 👀

100 acres to 3 random winners holding #BART.

To enter:

✅ Follow us & @HealmXR
✅ RT
✅ Tag 3 friends

ENDS on 30/08/22
Minimum retweets 30.

Tweet: https://twitter.com/bart_bsp/status/1558819630625554433

Partnership Reveal 📣

Meme Doge Elon Floki #Memelon will be listed on @RadioShack (on #BSC) with high liquidity soon.

RadioShack is a 100 year old brand with around 300k followers & a lot of growing partners in #crypto industry.

https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges/radioshack_bsc

Tweet: https://twitter.com/memeloncoin/status/1557712303919087616
